author: CBC News
title: What you need to know about COVID-19 in B.C. on April 13, 2020
description: Dr. Bonnie Henry announced 35 new cases on Saturday, bringing British Columbia's total to 1,445.
content:
THE LATEST:
  • Today's briefing with provincial health officer Dr. Bonnie Henry is at 1:30 p.m.
  • 35 new cases of COVID-19 and three more deaths were announced Saturday. 
  • The total number of people who have tested positive in B.C. is now 1… [+4296 chars]
